Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, west of Xedora's Magic Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Xedora's Magic Shop provides a number of unique and different potions which may or may not be useful for any adventure you might be going out on. On the west side of the road is the Oceancrest Municipal Library, holding a plethora of knowledge to be utilized by the city's citizens.
